subject: SYDE
title: Advanced Engineering Math 2
description: Series solutions of ordinary differential equations; Bessel functions, orthogonal functions, Fourier expansions and integral, Legendre polynomials, Sturm-Liouville systems. Partial differential equations; parabolic, hyperbolic and elliptic equations, numerical methods. Numerical integration; Gaussian quadrature, Runge-Kutta methods. Nonlinear systems; qualitative analysis, phase plane, Newton-Raphson method. [Offered: S]
